name: Music_3555.wav
keywords: ['blues song', 'male voice', 'guitar fills', 'guitar playing octaves', 'simple percussion', 'tambourine', 'bass', 'slow tempo', 'comforting song']
caption: This blues song features a male voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by the percussion playing a simple beat. The percussion plays the tambourine as well. The bass plays the same licks played on the guitar. The guitar plays notes that are octaves apart. Toward the end of the song, an overdrive guitar plays a hammer on note. The mood of this song is comforting. This song can be played in a bar.
